welcome.headline: Welcome to EinsSein
welcome.message: Together we shape a better future through social projects and workshops.

about.title: About Us
about.text: EinsSein is a non-profit organization dedicated to social justice, offering creative workshops for children and teenagers.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.headline: Who We Are
aboutPage.missionText1: At EinsSein, we believe in the power of truthfulness, unity, and commitment. Our goal is to awaken and foster these values in the heart of every individual.
aboutPage.missionText2: A special focus of our work is on children and young people. We aim to provide spaces where they can develop social skills, experience community, and unfold their creativity.
aboutPage.whatWeDoText1: Through diverse social projects and interactive workshops, we create learning and experiential environments.
aboutPage.whatWeDoText2: We emphasize active participation, encouraging participants not just to consume, but to co-create and learn to take responsibility for themselves and the community.
aboutPage.imageAlt: Symbolic image for community and learning

projectsPageContent.headline: Our Projects
projectsPageContent.intro: Discover our current projects and workshops. We look forward to your participation!
projectsPageContent.project1_desc: A weekly workshop where children can unleash their creativity and try out various artistic techniques.
projectsPageContent.project2_desc: A holiday camp for teenagers where we explore nature together, play team games, and learn about sustainable practices.
projectsPageContent.project3_desc: A course to strengthen empathy, communication, and conflict resolution for teenagers looking to improve their social skills.
